gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 121, Suns 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Suns, 121-115. Jaren Jackson Jr. led the way for the Grizzlies with 28 points (11-20 FG), 10 rebounds and six assists, while Marcus Smart added 25 points, six rebounds and eight assists in the victory. Devin Booker (24 points, eight assists) and Kevin Durant (23 points, 10 rebounds, five assists) combined for 47 points for the Suns in the losing effort. The Grizzlies have won back-to-back games as they improve to 13-23 on the season, while the Suns fall to 19-17.
